title: Mate2237
author: Mate2237
content: Backpack Bag Bitcoin Mining Machine is a device that is used to mine bitcoin at anywhere at anytime. It is hanged like a normal school bag. I may say, it is a mobile machine for mining whenever location the miner found him or herself. Really, I have not seen such in my life before but when I saw it on instagram I was amused and I asked a friend who is conversant with bitcoin to explain it for me and I also made some study in it. But in the internet source I did not see this particular one but real laptop bag for backpack mining.I really love this new technology for mining bitcoin with less energy.

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: So ya want to lug around a 20kg battery to be able to mine for what, maybe 15min at best?Ya would work with some USB sticks but any miner pulling over 100w or so is a definite no-go...

comments.author: n0nce
comments.body: Quote from: Mate2237 on August 25, 2022, 08:10:50 PMI really love this new technology for mining bitcoin with less energy.It doesn't use less energy; these are box-standard miners taped to a backpack.. That should be obvious to anyone.Why would you even create a new topic just because you found a funny picture online?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I'm sure this image is edited or someone just created it for fun because no one can withstand lifting a mining machine and battery for 24hrs. And I'm sure this is not profitable you are just going to waste your money with this bag pack. It would be better if it's a USB stick miner like NotFuzzyWarm said above the weight of a USB stick is around 0.05kg, unlike a mining machine like s9 with a weight of around 5 to 6kg plus the battery weight which is heavy I can't endure bringing them anywhere. If you want a lightweight USB stick, raspi, and portable power bank would be enough to bring them anywhere without getting tired.

comments.author: hymperion
comments.body: it will be a new costume for halloween

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Mate2237 on August 25, 2022, 08:10:50 PMBackpack Bag Bitcoin Mining Machine is a device that is used to mine bitcoin at anywhere at anytime. It is hanged like a normal school bag. I may say, it is a mobile machine for mining whenever location the miner found him or herself...Some technologies do not have any relevance, why would you want to walk around with a bag pack that mines bitcoin? have you not considered the security risk involved first and secondly health challenge this can present, you will be making yourself a walking target for muggers and a candidate for early back and waist pain.Quote from: Mate2237 on August 25, 2022, 08:10:50 PMI really love this new technology for mining bitcoin with less energy.The idea is good but in application, it is not making sense.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: The guy was actually walking around the conference with this running on his back.

comments.author: Rodemi
comments.body: I'd rather keep these machines somewhere safe and cool.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on September 13, 2022, 12:15:09 PMThe guy was actually walking around the conference with this running on his back. Hm, and I was almost writing that it must be fake.Did he turned it on? Was it noisy?However, as others said, it's not really a good use case because of the weight and because it may not mine for long enough, since the consumption is probably big.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Yes, it's good for the presentation, but it would be more fun if he rolled a cart with a generator of sufficient power to power his equipment, I wonder how much it would be enough, but it's not bad for fitness either.

comments.author: Andzi
comments.body: Imagine rocking up to Starbucks with this like; Hey! You got a 5amp breaker plug near a window here? Troll aside, looks sick but damn, my chiropractor would steal my gains.
